settings.title: Connect
settings.mailing_subheading: Sign up to receive 10% off your first order, exclusive offers, and design updates.

settings.about_paragraph: Unlike your typical upholstered dining chair, you don't have to worry about sticky fingers with this one. The Classic Dining Chair features removable upholstery that is machine-washable and stain-resistant. Better yet, the Chair Covers come in 30+ interchangeable colors, so you’ll never get bored with one look.
settings.desktop_overview_section_1_paragraph: Set the table—and the ambiance with this dining chair. You won’t even notice that there’s a removable cover on your elegantly upholstered dining chair. Get bored easily? Interchangeable covers let you change up your look!
settings.desktop_overview_section_2_paragraph: Just a few zips unzipped and snaps unsnapped and you can throw our Chair Covers right in the wash. After a cycle in the dryer, re-snap and zip on the chair base—just as you left it.
settings.desktop_overview_section_3_paragraph: If you’re not comfortable while you’re eating, then we haven’t done our job. Relax worry-free knowing that any spill of any kind can be taken care of in just one wash.
settings.features_section_1_paragraph: Impress your guests–and yourself. Made of a stain-resistant and machine-washable fabric that can withstand tough stain culprits such as coffee, hot sauce, red wine, and oil, these classic dining chairs look brand new after one wash.
settings.features_section_2_paragraph: Scared of commitment? Because our removable upholstery is easily interchangeable, you can try a new look whenever you desire. You’ll never have to reupholster a dining chair again!
settings.features_section_3_paragraph: Germs won’t seep into our chair bases and cushions! Covered with a waterproof fabric, Levity cushions repel liquids rather than soaking them in, so you can stop crying over spilled milk.
settings.features_section_4_paragraph: Sit back and relax in a traditional dining chair that has been designed with your comfort in mind. Premium features like form fitting memory foam cradle your body and offer support where you need it most.
settings.product_messaging_info: This is our current best estimate for when we will get your chair out of our LA-based facility and on its way to your home!

settings.name: Delivery
settings.section_1_paragraph:
We offer Free Standard Shipping and Handling within the U.S., excluding Hawaii, Alaska, and the U.S. Territories.

Our products are made to order and typically ship within 1-2 weeks after order placement. Please refer to the product page of the item you are interested in for the most up-to-date estimate of when that product is shipping. Once your product has shipped, it may take about an additional week to be delivered by a national shipping carrier.
settings.section_2_paragraph: We know how important it is to fill your home with pieces you love. That's why we offer a 30-day return policy on all Levity™ orders. If your order was delivered within the last 30 days, you may return or exchange your product. Please note that we charge a $35 return fee per item being returned.

settings.about_paragraph: Drink your morning coffee without worry in the charming and comfortable Scandinavian Dining Chair. With removable, machine-washable upholstery and a liquid-repelling base, cleanups are easy. Better yet, the chair covers come in 30+ interchangeable patterns, so you’ll never get bored with one look.
settings.desktop_overview_section_1_paragraph: Set the table—and the ambiance with this dining chair. You won’t even notice that there’s a removable cover on your elegantly upholstered dining chair. Get bored easily? Interchangeable covers let you change up your look!
settings.desktop_overview_section_2_paragraph: Just a few zips unzipped and snaps unsnapped and you can throw our Chair Covers right in the wash. After a cycle in the dryer, re-snap and zip on the chair base—just as you left it.
settings.desktop_overview_section_3_paragraph: If you’re not comfortable while you’re eating, then we haven’t done our job. Relax worry-free knowing that any spill of any kind can be taken care of in just one wash.
settings.features_section_1_paragraph: Our stain-resistant and machine-washable dining chair covers can withstand tough stain culprits such as coffee, hot sauce, red wine, and oil. One wash and these modern Scandinavian chairs look brand new.
settings.features_section_2_paragraph: Scared of commitment? Because our removable upholstery is easily interchangeable, you can try a new look whenever you desire. You’ll never have to reupholster a chair again!
settings.features_section_3_paragraph: Germs won’t seep into our chair bases and cushions! Covered with a waterproof fabric, Levity cushions repel liquids rather than soaking them in.
settings.features_section_4_paragraph: Sit back and relax in a midcentury-style dining chair that has been designed with your comfort in mind. Premium features like curved wood and form fitting memory foam cradle your body and offer support where you need it most.
settings.product_messaging_info: This is our current best estimate for when we will get your chair out of our LA-based facility and on its way to your home!

settings.about_paragraph: Clean up spills easily with the Scandinavian Lounge Chair, which features machine-washable and stain-resistant upholstery and liquid-repelling, premium foam cushions. This sleekly-designed contemporary lounge chair creates the perfect mid-century living room aesthetic and ideal place to relax. With 30+ interchangeable colors, you’ll never get bored with one look.
settings.desktop_overview_section_1_paragraph: Accent your living room, study, or even bedroom with this contemporary lounge chair. You—and more importantly your guests—won’t even notice that there’s a removable cover on your elegantly upholstered chair. Get bored easily? Interchangeable covers let you change up your look!
settings.desktop_overview_section_2_paragraph: Just a few zips unzipped and snaps unsnapped and you can throw our Chair Covers right in the wash. After a cycle in the dryer, re-snap and zip on the chair base—just as you left it.
settings.desktop_overview_section_3_paragraph: If you’re not comfortable while you’re watching TV, reading a book, or just hanging out with family and friends, then we haven’t done our job. Relax worry-free knowing that any spill of any kind can be taken care of in just one wash.
settings.features_section_1_paragraph: Designed with stain-resistant and machine-washable fabric, the Scandinavian Lounge Chair can withstand tough stain culprits such as coffee, hot sauce, red wine, and oil. One wash and these mid-century chairs look brand new.
settings.features_section_2_paragraph: Can’t make up your mind? With interchangeable chair covers, you don’t have to! Choose from over 30+ colors and patterns that you can mix and match to switch up your chair’s look as often as you desire.
settings.features_section_3_paragraph: Germs won’t seep into our chair bases and cushions! Covered with a waterproof fabric, Levity cushions repel liquids rather than soaking them in.
settings.features_section_4_paragraph: Life is busy and messy enough without furniture fuss. With innovative attachment features like Smart-Cinch bungees and wide-mouth zippers, each chair only takes minutes to put back intact. The Chair Covers go on easily and, unlike a traditional slipcover, they truly look like a part of the chair.
settings.product_messaging_info: This is our current best estimate for when we will get your chair out of our LA-based facility and on its way to your home!

settings.about_paragraph: The Classic Lounge Chair features machine-washable and stain-resistant upholstery and a liquid-repelling base, so the fear of a spill won't hold you back. Modern but classic, this cozy armchair feels right in any space. With 30+ interchangeable colors, you'll never get bored with one look.
settings.desktop_overview_section_1_paragraph: Accent your living room, study, or even bedroom with this sophisticated lounge chair. You—and more importantly your guests—won’t even notice that there’s a removable cover on your elegantly upholstered chair. Get bored easily? Interchangeable covers let you change up your look!

settings.features_section_2_paragraph: Scared of commitment? Because our removable upholstery is easily interchangeable, you can try a new look whenever you desire. You’ll never have to reupholster an accent chair again!
settings.features_section_3_paragraph: Germs won’t seep into our lounge chair bases and cushions! Covered with a waterproof fabric, Levity cushions repel liquids rather than soaking them in.
settings.features_section_4_paragraph: Life is busy and messy enough without furniture fuss. With innovative attachment features like Smart-Cinch bungees and wide-mouth zippers, each chair only takes minutes to put back intact. The Chair Covers go on easily and, unlike a traditional slipcover, they truly look like a part of the chair.

settings.about_paragraph: Our Chair Covers are interchangeable. Order extras so that you can change up your chair's style whenever you choose.

You and more importantly your guests won’t even notice that there’s a removable cover on your elegantly upholstered chair. Get bored easily? Interchangeable covers let you change up your look!

settings.blog_bio_text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

settings.subscribe_subheading: Sign up and receive the latest tips via email.

settings.iwt_text:
All of our chairs have lightweight, machine washable covers that are easy to remove and easy to put back on.

Just unzip, un-bungee, or unsnap to remove the cover. Throw it in the wash, dry on low heat, and reattach. Then get on with your life.

All of our chairs have lightweight, machine washable covers that are easy to remove and easy to put back on. Just unzip, un-bungee, or unsnap to remove the cover. Throw it in the wash, dry on low heat, and reattach. Then get on with your life.

settings.txt_text_1: Unzip, unsnap, or unstrap your chair's fabric cover to remove it from the base.
settings.txt_text_2: Wash the cover with mild detergent and dry on low heat.
settings.txt_text_3: Recover the chair, then zip, snap, or strap it back into place.
settings.txt_text_4: You're done! Sit back and relax on your freshly cleaned chair.

settings.fv_heading: How to Wash Your Classic Dining Chair
How to Wash Your Classic Lounge Chair
How to Wash Your Scandinavian Dining Chair
How to Wash Your Scandinavian Lounge Chair

settings.fc_heading: Check out our products to learn more

settings.title: Life is messy.  Your chairs shouldn't be.™
settings.text: We believe that homes are meant to be lived in. That’s why we created chairs with machine washable slipcovers that look great in any room.

settings.title: We've got you covered.
settings.text: All of our upholstery is fully removable, with innovative features that make it easy to take off and reattach.

settings.title: Live Now. Wash Later.
settings.text: Our removable Chair Covers are washer and dryer safe. Wash away spills, stains, and pet accidents with ease.

settings.iwt_text:
At Levity, we believe you should feel at home in your home. Accidents happen. Life is messy.
We make products that eliminate the stress that often accompanies the mess.

We spent years developing, testing, and re-engineering our products from the ground up, to ensure they’re equal parts liveable and loveable.

Our hope is that eliminating worry and stress in your home will create more room for memorable life moments.

No more crying over spilled milk. No more noisy plastic slip covers. No more “off-limits” rooms.

Just sit back and relax – we’ve got you covered.

settings.io_hidden_text:
Our design team takes pride in building innovative pieces
that look just as wonderful as they feel.
Never choose between form and function again.

It’s quite simple. We’ve stress-tested our chairs
against anything real life could throw at it (literally).

From sticky sundaes and chocolate chunks to rogue red wine
and clumsy coffee spills, our chairs can take it.

settings.iwt_text: Inspired by timeless architecture and interior trends, each Levity product is designed to fit seamlessly into your home’s aesthetic. Express yourself without replacing your furniture each season.
Our design team carefully and creatively tests just about every possible mess or accident that can happen in the home. Trust us, each Levity product is ready for whatever you throw its way.
Premium comfort features like form-fitting memory foam cradle your body for a cloud-like feel, without deteriorating over time. Relax for hours – you, your family, or the dog!
Change your home decor like you change your clothes! With cleanable, interchangeable Chair Covers available in 30+ fabrics, you can reupholster your chair in just seconds!

We take our customer feedback and reviews to heart! Levity prides itself on designing for real life... your life! We seek to build genuine relationships with our customers and thank them for inviting Levity into their home.

settings.title: Never get bored.
settings.text: With interchangeable upholstery in over 30 styles, customize your furniture for the season–or your mood!

settings.title: Washable Whites
settings.subheading: Finally, Chairs that Stay Bright & White!

settings.title: Add a title to your image

settings.colors_section_style: hidden lg:grid-cols-5 mb-4 md:grid md:grid-cols-4 relative
settings.colors_image_style: lg:col-span-3 lg:h-full lg:mb-2 lg:ml-auto lg:mr-4 lg:px-1 lg:w-11/12 md:col-span-2 md:ml-0
settings.colors_text: Timeless and classic, neutral-colored chairs highlight earthy and muted tones for a totally natural look. These subtle-toned chairs fit perfectly in any style you choose and add an understated elegance to your space.
settings.colors_button_style: py-2 w-3/4 bg-brown font-light text-base text-center font-serif

settings.colors_section_style: hidden lg:grid-cols-5 mb-4 md:grid md:grid-cols-4 relative
settings.colors_header_style: inline-block mr-4 text-right font-serif text-2xl text-blue-dark
settings.colors_image_style: lg:col-span-3 lg:h-full lg:mb-2 lg:mr-auto lg:ml-4 lg:px-1 lg:w-11/12 md:col-span-2 md:ml-0
settings.colors_section_body_style: lg:col-span-2 lg:mr-0 lg:my-auto md:col-span-2 md:mr-4 text-right
settings.colors_text: Gray chairs never fail to help the other colors in your space pop. Whether it’s light gray or charcoal gray, these chairs will blend seamlessly into the background, complementing a wide range of patterns, textures, and colors.
settings.colors_button_style: py-2 w-3/4 bg-brown font-light text-base text-center font-serif

settings.colors_image_style: col-span-3 mb-2 px-1 w-11/12 ml-auto mr-4
settings.colors_text: Blue chairs can instantly add a more relaxing, elegant, or even head-turning vibe to any room. From arctic to dark denim blue chairs, we have machine-washable chairs that are perfect for your space.
settings.colors_button_style: py-2 w-3/4 bg-brown font-light text-base text-center font-serif

settings.colors_header_style: inline-block mr-4 text-right font-serif text-2xl text-blue-dark
settings.colors_image_style: col-span-3 mb-2 px-1 w-11/12 ml-4 mr-auto
settings.colors_text: Drawing inspiration from the colors of nature, green chairs can enliven and refresh any space. All of our machine-washable, upholstered Chair Covers in vibrant hues of green will add a pop of personality to your space.
settings.colors_button_style: py-2 w-3/4 bg-brown font-light text-base text-center font-serif

settings.colors_image_style: col-span-3 mb-2 px-1 w-11/12 ml-auto mr-4
settings.colors_text: If you want your chair to command the attention of anyone walking into the room yet maintain an understated elegance, a red or yellow chair may be the piece your space needs. Being bold without being loud, these vibrant and youthful chairs will instantly lend a playful vibe to any room.
settings.colors_button_style: py-2 w-3/4 bg-brown font-light text-base text-center font-serif

settings.colors_header_style: inline-block mr-4 text-right font-serif text-2xl text-blue-dark
settings.colors_image_style: col-span-3 mb-2 px-1 w-11/12 ml-4 mr-auto
settings.colors_text: Liven up a neutral-toned room, draw attention to an area, and showcase your personal style with a colorful chair. For a room with multiple motifs and color themes, a multicolored accent chair can also fit in both whimsically and seamlessly at the same time.
settings.colors_button_style: py-2 w-3/4 bg-brown font-light text-base text-center font-serif

settings.colors_footer_text: We’ve gotten some questions about how we came up with the name “Levity™” for our revolutionary washable furniture brand. What better way to share our “What does Levity™ mean?” answer with you all than with our newly introduced blog?!

settings.colors_footer_header: Taking Off & Washing Your Chair Cover
settings.colors_footer_text: One of the best parts about Levity™ chairs is that they look fully upholstered, but the upholstered Chair Covers actually come off to easily throw into the wash and clean.

settings.shop_all_colors_header_text: Our washable chairs come in a wide variety of colors. If you’re wondering which chair color perfectly complements your room theme, look no further. Here we give you a host of options, plus some tips on how to choose the perfect chair color for you.

settings.legal_text: By signing up, you agree to Levity™’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Service, and to receive Levity™ offers, promotions, and other commercial messages. You may unsubscribe from our marketing emails at any time.

settings.hero_subheading: Save on our washable Classic Dining Chairs with code CDN15.
settings.under_button_text: *Exclusions apply. See our terms.
settings.collection_hero_secondary_title: Enjoy The Fresh Start Event with code

settings.black_friday_sale_announcement: Black Friday Sale: 20% off Sitewide with code BF2021
settings.cyber_monday_sale_announcement: Last Day to Save: 20% off Sitewide with code CM2021

settings.header_text: Looking for the best chairs to elevate the style of your living room, dining room, bedroom, or study? Then look no further. Take a cue from our shoppers and get inspired by their top picks for best chairs and upholstered, washable chair covers.

settings.title: Don't Stress the mess
settings.body:
At Levity, we believe you should feel at home in your home. Accidents happen. Life is messy. We make products that eliminate the stress that often accompanies the mess.

We spent years developing, testing, and re-engineering our products from the ground up, to ensure they’re equal parts liveable and loveable.

settings.title: Live More Life
settings.body:
Our hope is that eliminating worry and stress in your home will create more room for memorable life moments.

No more crying over spilled milk. No more noisy plastic slip covers. No more “off-limits” rooms.

settings.title: Quality Built to Last
settings.body:
Our design team takes pride in building innovative pieces
that look just as wonderful as they feel. Never choose between form and function again.

It’s quite simple. We’ve stress-tested our chairs against anything real life could throw at it (literally).

From sticky sundaes and chocolate chunks to rogue red wine and clumsy coffee spills, our chairs can take it.

settings.title: Timeless Style
settings.body: Inspired by timeless architecture and interior trends, each Levity product is designed to fit seamlessly into your home’s aesthetic. Express yourself without replacing your furniture each season.

settings.title: Rigorous Testing
settings.body: Our design team carefully and creatively tests just about every possible mess or accident that can happen in the home. Trust us, each Levity product is ready for whatever you throw its way.

settings.title: Interchangeable Covers
settings.body: Change your home decor like you change your clothes! With cleanable, interchangeable Chair Covers available in 30+ fabrics, you can reupholster your chair in just seconds!

settings.title: Customer Feedback
settings.body: We take our customer feedback and reviews to heart! Levity prides itself on designing for real life... your life! We seek to build genuine relationships with our customers and thank them for inviting Levity into their home.

settings.collection_hero_secondary_title: Includes all chairs & covers* with code

settings.hero_subheading: Save on our washable Classic Dining Chairs with code CDN15.
settings.collection_hero_secondary_title: Includes all chairs & covers* with code

settings.custom_section_1_text: Don’t stress the mess! Levity furniture has removable upholstery that is stain-resistant and washer/dryer safe.
settings.custom_section_2_text: Levity chairs look and feel fully upholstered. And with 30+ interchangeable colors and patterns, you can refresh your room as often as you change your clothes.
settings.custom_section_3_text: With memory foam comfort and premium cushions that won't sag or deform after years of use, it's the best seat in the house! You'll never want to get up.

settings.custom_section_1_text: Never wrap plastic around your furniture again! Levity chairs have removable upholstery that is stain-resistant and washer/dryer safe.
settings.custom_section_2_text: Levity chairs look and feel fully upholstered. And with 30+ interchangeable colors and patterns, you can change the look of your room as often as Fido asks for a treat.
settings.custom_section_3_text: Our heavy-weight basketweave upholstery is designed to be pet-friendly. Better yet, premium memory foam cushions provide a seat you’ll love sinking into!

settings.header: New Washable Patterns for Every Style
settings.custom_section_1_text: Never reupholster a chair again! Wash and dry our removable Chair covers for a simpler style refresh.
settings.custom_section_2_text: Feel at home in your own home with over 30 pattern and color options to choose from! Mix and match for an even more personalized feel.
settings.custom_section_3_text: The best seat in the house... now in every room! With memory foam comfort and premium cushions, say goodbye to fighting over the good chair.

settings.quote_1: “I love knowing that it can handle my lifestyle, whatever spills may come.”
settings.quote_2: “made out of durable, machine-washable covers that were designed to take a beating”
settings.quote_3: “modern style when it comes to your home shouldn't mean an inability to live in it”
settings.quote_4: “there's a perfect chair design for your lifestyle.”

settings.header: Timeless Texture That Sits Just Right
settings.custom_section_1_text: A classic in haberdasheries and homes alike, the herringbone pattern will draw you in with its subtle details and chevron pattern.
settings.custom_section_2_text: Feel at home with a variety of herringbone color options. Mix and match for an even more personalized feel!
settings.custom_section_3_text: Never reupholster a chair again! Wash and dry our removable herringbone Chair Covers for a simple refresh.

settings.header: Finally Chairs That Stay White and Bright!
settings.custom_section_1_text: Brighten any room with ivory, white, bone, and off white upholstery, available in a host of patterns. Don't just settle for a boring white chair. Spice it up with light and bright patterns!
settings.custom_section_2_text: So long, stains! Our removable Chair Covers handle tough spills and messes in a single wash cycle. Just sit back, relax, and enjoy your white furniture!
settings.custom_section_3_text: Invite guests, pets, and kids to take a seat. No more "off-limits" rooms or furniture. Relax into comfy memory foam and rest assured that any accidents can be cleaned right up!
